alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 3:02AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. The period of heaviest accumulation is expected later this afternoon through the overnight hours. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with higher amounts at the highest elevations. Winds gusting 30 mph to as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Williams. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Friday: Doney Park 9 to 15 inches Flagstaff 15 to 21 inches Forest Lakes 14 to 20 inches Fredonia 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 2 to 4 inches Jacob Lake 8 to 12 inches Prescott 7 to 11 inches Prescott Valley 3 to 5 inches Sedona 2 to 4 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Williams 12 to 18 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
